metadata.title: CVE-2018-10998 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Exiv2 0.26. readMetadata in jp2image.cpp allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (SIGABRT) by triggering anincorrect Safe::add call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10998` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
